title: Aaron Paul dotes on his daughter Story as he carries the apple of his eye through NYC
text:
He may be used to playing tough guys on the big screen, but in real life Aaron Paul can't say no to his little girl.

The actor, 40, affectionately carried his daughter Story through New York on Wednesday.

Story, one, looked every inch daddy's little girl as she enjoyed a ride through the city while sipping on her juice carton.

Daddy's little girl! Aaron Paul doted on his one-year-old daughter Story in New York City on Wednesday

Looking oh-so-cute in a furry pink sweater, the youngster had clearly inherited her father's cool eye for style.

The Breaking Bad actor was looking like a rock star in a leather jacket, grey slacks, and suede boots.

The actor even wore a silver necklace, adding a Southwestern touch to his ensemble.

At one point, Aaron set his daughter down the floor, though still kept her close by holding her hand.

Aww: Paul was every inch the adoring father as he held his little girl's hand

His girls: The Breaking Bad actor was joined by his wife of six years, Lauren

The father-daughter duo were joined by Aaron's wife Lauren, who was looking oh-so-in-love with her husband whilst walking arm-in-arm with him through the city.

Lauren wore a striped shirt, high-waist jeans, a cardigan and a pink wide-brim hat.

Aaron took over stroller duties as they continued on with their walk, and gently pushed Story in her carriage.

What's that? Something seemed to catch Story's eye

Mommy's here! The couple took turns holding their daughter, and Lauren gently held her little girl close while crossing the street

Domestic bliss: Aaron and Lauren married in 2013 and welcomed daughter Story five years later

Laughing, smiling, and looking so in sync, the couple were the picture of domestic bliss as they made their way to dinner with friends.

The couple parked the stroller by their dinner table while catching up with pals al fresco.

Aaron and Lauren married in 2013 and welcomed daughter Story together five years later.

Doting dad: The El Camino actor assumed stroller duties at one point

The apple of his eye: The 40-year-old was more than happy to push his little girl in her stroller

As far as his career, Aaron has returned to the small screen as Jesse Pinkman in the new Netflix film, El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie.

Aaron shot to stardom playing the beloved sidekick of Walter White in the hit Breaking Bad series, which ended in 2013 to critical acclaim.

The new Netflix film takes place after the events of the season finale, and sees Jesse now on the run as the target of a massive police manhunt.

The film was released October 11 and is clearly a hit.

On Wednesday, Netflix announced the film had been viewed by 25,734,392 households in its first seven days.
description: The 40-year-old Breaking Bad actor affectionately carried his daughter Story in his arms while making their way through New York City together. They were joined by Aaron's wife, Lauren.
